channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MyCSS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- MyCSS

item.title: CVE-2022-1960|2024-08-03T00:24:43.987Z -- unknown -- mycss
item.description: The MyCSS WordPress plugin through 1.1 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
